region: In forested areas north of the St. Laurent River
conseils: Do not get in between the mother and her cub.
Inspect your ankles and exposed skin after being in the forest.
If bit, go to the pharmacy or see a doctor as you may need preventive medication.
If you were in contact with a racoon or another carrier of rabies, you must get treated preventively.
If symptoms of rabies appear, the disease is deadly and it is too late.
